name: PegDrop
description:
This is a simple match the peg to hole game, but with a twist to make it a little bit more challenging.

The game will lie about the shape and color and you have to figure out which one is the right one.

This is my very first game, the graphichs is very crude and I know the triangle model is missing 2 internal faces, did not have time or knowledge at the moment to fix this.

But it is playable :)
